alert.note: Alert for Darlington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 3:55PM EDT until August 27 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR DARLINGTON COUNTY... At 355 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lydia to near Auburn, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Hartsville, North Hartsville, Clyde, Dovesville, Oats, Mont Clare, Lydia, Auburn, Floyd, Swift Creek, Kellytown, and Carolina Pines Regional Medical Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
